page_content: The page discusses the Bündner government's stance on the regulation of abortion in Switzerland.
The page reports the sighting of a bear in Val Müstair and the subsequent actions taken by the Amt für Jagd und Fischerei.
The page discusses various administrative and governmental matters, including a voting complaint and new regulations.

The page discusses a police action involving a private helicopter during demonstrations and blockades at Landquart station.
The page informs about traffic disruptions due to the Swiss Epic Mountainbike Event in Graubünden.
The page discusses a Kids-Event organized by the Kantonspolizei Graubünden focusing on traffic instruction and skills tests for children.
The page informs about traffic restrictions due to the Engadin Skimarathon organized by the Kantonspolizei Graubünden.
The page discusses the Bündner government's stance on allowing the conditional withdrawal of a popular initiative in the case of an indirect counter-proposal.
The page discusses the implementation of the new Child and Adult Protection Law in Graubünden and poses questions to the government regarding its effectiveness.
